name: Generate HTML links
description:
# Generate HTML links

We need a HTML menu.... but writing HTML over and-over-again is _boooring_... Let's just generate it instead!

## Task: 

Write a function `generateMenu()` with the following inputs/output:

**Inputs**: 

`menuItems`: An array of objects (with `url` and `text` properties), which represents our menu items

**Output**: 

A string of HTML containing an [anchor tag](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a) for each element of `menuItems` (with the appropriate `href` attribute and _text content_)
